bow: moms of reddit what should buy my brother first child crossed baby clothes off the list since that seems to be the main thing that parents tend to get too much of think so at least do have any children so need some guidance thought about diapers but they told me that they were gon na subscribe to something so that they get diapers delivered all year round maybe should still send couple thought about maybe some baby food making tools but they re already buying baby bullet my brother girlfriend family is going to spoil this child for sure and sure they ll get everything that they ll need so lost am all about education though so definitely sending some baby books reading to your children is important otherwise idk maybe ll just do the easy thing and buy clothes edit so ve already added some things onto my wishlist on amazon diaper depot holds diapers wipes etc teething necklace some teething tablets to help for pain and that stroller thing that was suggested to me still open to suggestions money books are good too sound machine white noise rainforest or baby songs it saved us and is gift we still use almost years later definitely think books are great idea it is really nice to have board books especially since they get lot of wear and tear and biting from kids so can be not as awesome from the library if you can find some of the books you loved as kids even better honestly you can never have too many books love reading to my daughter and have been since we brought her home and ca wait to read to our new little girl once she born also they re not always cheap and can add up what about gift for the parents then or for mom home spa kit or gift certificate would probably be so appreciated what about netflix subscription or gift card to babies us buy buy baby target will always come in handy picture frame like the milestone ones subscribe to the diaper delivery and can still say ve run out from time to time but it hard to predict when what size that ll happen books reading to babies starting from before they even understand simulates learning bonding and connects books to feeling comforted and loved therefore producing life long readers as an aside am an usborne books independent consultant if you would like some ideas for books dm me but would say books no matter what what loved when had shower for my first was someone getting me infant tylenol and baby orajel and diaper rash cream etc it something you do really think about baby orjel is not recommended it hardens the gums and makes teething worse books are great my friend gave us gift card for babies us which immediately went for rocker and we were totally under prepared with crib sheets we got way too many blankets and clothes tuck some gift cards to restaurants in there so the parents can pick up food in those no sleep early days or get piggy bank perhaps in theme with the nursery and tuck some coins or bills in there maybe little pull toy to hook on the stroller like this http www amazon com gp aw b00ir4f3lm ref=mp qid=1439241837 amp sr=1 amp refinements=p 3ainfantino amp pi=ac sx200 ql40 amp dppl=1 amp dpid=51bgl0jzknl amp ref=plsrch deleted yea books was my first thought heavy reader myself yea my friends that have kids usually get books from me haha last one bought her little girl peter rabbit pop up book since loved peter rabbit and as former substitute teacher think reading is hella important wish someone would gift me money haha this it does even need to be baby version although the parents might like the idea of heartbeat it also great for the entire family when you travel my youngest is almost and we still bring it when we go somewhere overnight my favorite gift was tsedakah box it like piggy bank but you collect for charity it jewish tradition but the theme is universal it helped my daughter learn an important fine motor skill while also making charity part of her earliest life we got one that looks like penguin with light and sound the light show distracts them during sleep training and the noise is lifesaver for soothing have feeling we will use ours until she too yup we still use ours four years later it amazing for our small apartment we can watch tv without him waking up have package of stuff that found indispensable when my son was newborn plain cotton onesies in multiple sizes buy newborn 12 months they are super cheap at old navy everybody buys cute fancy outfits that are impractical for daily use these are easy to put on and when they get poop or spit up on them you can toss em wet bags these are waterproof fabric bags that can hold wet dirty clothes diapers or burp cloths keep one in my diaper bag at all times nosefrida snot sucker yes it disgusting but it works so well the first time the baby has stuffy nose at am they will be singing your praises gift card for whatever their local chain drugstore is cvs rite aid etc when they realize they just put the last clean diaper on the baby or just need some candy this will be the best gift ever hope this is helpful clothes in bigger size love pulling out box of brand new clothes that the kiddo finally fits surprised no one has said this yet if they have baby registry made pick something off of there before choosing something else for them it shows you exactly what they want and or need books are great pick out your favorite book from childhood and write little note to the little monkey in the front cover my daughter has one from my best friend and she loves reading the note from aunt maggie nosefrida pay for housekeeping service to swing by and do some cleaning get kit for taking impressions of baby hands and feet something got at the baby shower unexpectedly that loved was toddler space saver seat it was booster seat that could replace high chair so she could sit right at the table google 34 99 fisher price healthy care deluxe booster seat red loved this so much we still use it and she is years old will get something similar for my month old and we wo use our big high chair the second time around holy crap netflix sub would have been awesome while was on leave ended up watching far too much kardashian drama did even know needed that until now definitely getting subscription when we add second one books also my brother started savings account for each of my sons he adds money for birthdays christmas etc and then just gives them small gift to open it fun to watch it growing high chair bumbo glider swing boba mei tei baby wearer diaper bag boppy baby monitor clothes hangers organizers laundry basket dreft laundry detergent tummy time mat play gym soft blocks infantino rings crib sheets changing pad diaper genie bibs subscription to amazon mom yardworkers dog walkers house cleaners for labor week month there are so many baby things baby gym infants really enjoy it and it all the more precious because it among the first toys the baby will use our baby did her first grab and first roll in that it was gift from my sister and every time she smiled everyone said what great gift her aunt gave https www fisher price com en us brands babytoys products rainforest melodies and lights deluxe gym here are some toys recommended to support baby development http mamaot com 2012 07 09 15 toys for babys first year plastic bibs omg wish had found those darned things before started getting cloth ones an amazon prime subscription or some blue apron food food ingredient delivery alternatively making sure the new parents have library card can save them *thousands* over lifetime babies love the feeling of satiny fabric someone got my son baby blanket that was plush on one side and satin on the other it was and still is his prized possession ve given similar ones to all my friends with kids and they all had similar experiences bonus get two or one large and one small one on case of loss or just for travel this is where get them custom made http hyenacart com bububebe 1117 category 36 blankets there are plenty of other private sellers who will make them too they are so cozy have contemplated buying the adult sized ones few times deleted going to 2nd books maybe something engraved from things remembered would be nice also those 12 month stickers that go on their shirts for monthly pictures or scrapbook if you re crafty you could pre make pages for them to just add pictures to bathtime sleeping pictures relevant holidays first tooth etc thoughtful gifts are always best no one remembers who bought that cute onsie with the ruffles but everyone loves the engraved snowglobe or baby book if you do go with reading books though my suggestion would be to write little note in it to mom baby dad again thoughtful especially if they re already going to have things they need deleted my personal favorites diaper genie amp refills for those who do disposable diapers and mybaby portable white noise machine with extra aaa batteries my daughter is and we rock that out every nap and every night nostalgic books are great if there anything you remember reading with your brother as kid goodnight moon was big deal in our house and my sister got the book and the stuffed rabbit for my son it was adorable books of many varieties board books rhyming books books with long stories the variety will help keep mom and dad sane can not stress enough how important food is during those first few weeks home mom is getting 15 minutes of sleep every two hours and dad is getting 30 to 45 because he is helping mom not go crazy get them gift cards to places that deliver and if you drop by to see the cute baby bring food always bring food and maybe do some dishes when the baby is eating both my husband and gush about the people who brought us food because it is so hard to feed yourself when you are trying to keep tiny human alive it is exhausting and emotional and crazy live out of state poor graduate student not gon na happen lol wished someone would clean my house so bad the first weeks or so would have loved cleaning service miracle blanket with my first had only swaddle blankets with my second got miracle blanket life changing this is the most useful baby thing got http www amazon ca happiest baby block harvey karp dp 0553381466 this book taught me all the basics about soothing and infant and helped me my husband and son get so much more sleep this book is so popular that you can probably pick it up for at any local thrift store and in canada so that saying something you can never have enough baby clothes it always good thing to have extra clothes since babies mess up their clothes lot as in drool spit up etc one of my in laws sent me goody bag of baby medicine cabinet goodies like gripe water baby tylenol boo bunny ice pack teething gel nose suction and boogie wipes for my son few weeks before he was born the nose frida looks weird at first but the suction on it works better than the regular old suction bulbs even something simple too like big box of some baby wipes lotion bath time stuff are great to give expecting parents the little extra simple stuff helps the parents out lot books are great especially the classics like goodnight moon the very
